  • pyphoon.clean

pyphoon.clean¶

Typhoon sequences might come with some corrupted images, mainly due to technical failures in the sensors collecting the data. Such data can contaminate later applied statistical methods and thus should either be removed or corrected. To this end, this library attempts to provide a set of tools to fix such problems.

Note

In the future, this library should provide tools to, not only correct corrupted images but other sorts of data

Getting started

In this example we will fix a sequence by using method detect_corrupted_pixels_1() to detect corrupted frames, correct_corrupted_pixels_1() to correct those and generate_new_frames_1() to generate new frames in order to fill some temporal gaps.

>>> from pyphoon.clean.fix import TyphoonListImageFixAlgorithm
>>> from pyphoon.clean.detection import detect_corrupted_pixels_1
>>> from pyphoon.clean.correction import correct_corrupted_pixels_1
>>> from pyphoon.clean.fillgaps import generate_new_frames_1

Once the aforementioned methods are loaded, we can define an instance of TyphoonListFixAlgorithm. Note the parameter params, which contains information related to the detection and fillgaps methods.

>>> fix_algorithm = TyphoonListImageFixAlgorithm(
    detect_fct=detect_corrupted_pixels_1,
    correct_fct=correct_corrupted_pixels_1,
    fillgaps_fct=generate_new_frames_1,
    detect_params={'min_th': 160, 'max_th': 310},
    n_frames_th=2
)

Finally, we load the typhoon images from ../original_data/image/199607 as a TyphoonList instance and apply the fix algorithm to it.

>>> from pyphoon.io.typhoonlist import create_typhoonlist_from_source
>>> seq = create_typhoonlist_from_source('../original_data/image/199607')
>>> seq_fixed = fix_algorithm.apply(seq)

Modules

module Description
pyphoon.clean.fix Used to define the Fixing algorithm
pyphoon.clean.detection Provides set of algorithms to detect corrupted frames
pyphoon.clean.correction Provides set of algorithms to correct corrupted frames
pyphoon.clean.fillgaps Provides set of algorithms to fill the temporal gaps

pyphoon.clean.fix¶

class pyphoon.clean.fix.TyphoonListImageFixAlgorithm(detect_fct=None, correct_fct=None, fillgaps_fct=None, detect_params=None, n_frames_th=None)¶

Bases: object

Encapsulates an algorithm to correct and clean (“fix”) a typhoon sequence.

Variables:
  • detect_fct – Method used to detect corrupted frames (more details in detection)
  • correct_fct – Method used to correct corrupted frames (more details in correction)
  • fillgaps_fct – Method used to fill gaps in a sequence (more details in fillgaps)
  • detect_params – Parameters required to assist the detection method. More details can be found in the specific detection method (see from detection)
  • n_frames_th – Largest temporal gap to fill with newly generated image frames (measured in slots of 1h). In other words, if there is a temporal gap of more than n_frames_th hours no new image frames are generated.
apply(typhoon_sequence, display=False)¶

Applies the defined fix algorithm to a given typhoon sequence.

Parameters:
  • typhoon_sequence (TyphoonList) – Input typhoon sequence to be fixed.
  • display (bool) – Set to True to print execution information.
Returns:

New typhoon sequence with cleaned data.
Return type:

TyphoonList
clear()¶

Resets the list of corrected/generated frame ids.

detect_and_correct(typhoon_sequence, display)¶

Detects and corrects irregularities in image frames from typhoon_sequence using the methods specified by attributes detect_fct and correct_fct, respectively.

Parameters:
  • typhoon_sequence (TyphoonList) – Input typhoon sequence to be fixed.
  • display (bool) – Set to True to print execution information.
Returns:

Ids of the corrected images
Return type:

list

See also

pyphoon.clean.detection, pyphoon.clean.correction

fill_gaps(typhoon_sequence)¶

Fills the gaps in the given typhoon sequence using the method specified by attribute fillgaps_fct.

Parameters:typhoon_sequence (TyphoonList) – Input typhoon sequence to be fixed.
Returns:List with the ids of the new generated frames
Return type:list

See also

pyphoon.clean.fillgaps

pyphoon.clean.fix.generate_image_frames_ids(typhoon_sequence, frame_idx_0, frame_idx_1, n_frames=1)¶

Generates ids of n_frames in between positions frame_idx_0 and frame_idx_1. This is useful when new image frames have been generated through interpolation and require an id.

Parameters:
  • typhoon_sequence (TyphoonList) – Sequence of typhoon
  • frame_idx_0 (int) – Index of first frame
  • frame_idx_1 (int) – Index of second frame
  • n_frames – Number of frames for which an id has to be generated.
Returns:

List of newly generated ids.
Return type:

list

pyphoon.clean.detection¶

This submodule contains different methods to detect corrupted images. The standard notation is detect_corrupted_pixels_<method index>.

pyphoon.clean.detection.detect_corrupted_pixels_1(image_frame, params)¶

Detects pixel positions that are corrupted using a rather simple approach. It forces all pixels to be within the range defined by [min_th, max_th].

Parameters:
  • image_frame (numpy.array) – Image frame
  • params (dict) –

    Should contain two keys:

    • min_th: Minimum tolerated pixel intensity (temperature) value.
    • max_th: Maximum tolerated pixel intensity (temperature) value.
Returns:

pyphoon.clean.correction¶

This submodule contains different methods to correct corrupted images. The standard notation is correct_corrupted_pixels_<method index>.

pyphoon.clean.correction.correct_corrupted_pixels_1(typhoon_sequence, index, pos, detect_fct, display, params)¶

Corrects the pixels in region pos from image frame at position index of typhoon_sequence. To this end, it uses interpolation of this region in nearby frames.

Parameters:
  • typhoon_sequence (TyphoonList) – List of typhoon frames
  • index (int) – Frame index from typhoon_sequence
  • pos (numpy.array) – Numpy array of same dimensionality than typhoon_sequence.image[index] with True values in regions containing corrupted pixels. False values refer to regions with no corrupted pixels.
  • detect_fct (callable) – Callable function that detects corrupted values from an array according to some given rules.
  • display (True) – Set to True if execution information should be printed.
  • params (dict) – Parameters for detection function
Returns:

pyphoon.clean.fillgaps¶

This submodule contains different methods to fill the temporal gaps with new synthetic images. The standard notation is generate_new_frames_<method index>.

pyphoon.clean.fillgaps.generate_new_frames_1(typhoon_sequence, frame_idx_0, frame_idx_1, n_frames=1)¶

Linearly interpolates two frames from a typhoon sequence.

Parameters:
  • typhoon_sequence (TyphoonList) – Sequence of typhoon data
  • frame_idx_0 (int) – First frame index
  • frame_idx_1 (int) – Second frame index
  • n_frames (int) – Number of frames to generate using interpolation
Returns:

List with the new generated frames
Return type:

list
